section_path: Section I > C. Chapter-Specific Coding Guidelines > 12. Chapter 12: Diseases of the Skin and Subcutaneous Tissue > a. Pressure ulcer stage codes > 3) Documented pressure ulcer stage

content.full_text: Assignment of the pressure ulcer stage code should be guided by clinical documentation of the stage or documentation of the terms found in the Alphabetic Index. For clinical terms describing the stage that are not found in the Alphabetic Index, and there is no documentation of the stage, the provider should be queried. (Evidence: pg no: 59, L42-L43)
